definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

sentences.english: M: What do you think of the questionnaire report?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得這份問卷調查報告怎麼樣？

sentences.english: The article introduced the status of the questionnaire survey in north Hebei.
sentences.chinese: 介紹冀北地區能效服務問卷調查情況。

sentences.english: Some topics of the questionnaire are modified according to pre-test results.
sentences.chinese: 修改後問卷經過檢驗，達到較高信度和效度水平。

sentences.english: The paper is based on the data of questionnaire, and comprises five chapters.
sentences.chinese: 文章在問卷調查所得數據基礎上展開研究，共五章。

sentences.english: The questionnaire and exam are employed in the study.
sentences.chinese: 本研究採用的是問卷法和測驗法。

sentences.english: Participants stood with either a light or heavy clipboard cradled intheir arm, filling out surveys.
sentences.chinese: 參與者手持一個或輕或重的剪貼板站着填寫調查問卷。

sentences.english: Self-made questionnaire for child temperament related factors was used.
sentences.chinese: 用自制“兒童氣質相關因素問卷”進行相關因素調查。

sentences.english: Clinical outcomes were evaluated using Scoliosis Research Society and Oswestry Disability Index Questionnaires.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀結果使用SRS和奧斯維斯殘疾指數問卷評估。

sentences.english: The research data are collected through self-made questionnaires.
sentences.chinese: 研究數據採用問卷調查的方式收集。

sentences.english: Class surveys now reveal that younger women want to hear the magic words.
sentences.chinese: 學生問卷調查顯示，年輕女性更願意聽到愛情密語。

sentences.english: Therefore, we re-design this survey, and ask you to fill in again.
sentences.chinese: 故此設計這個問卷調查，請再次填寫。

sentences.english: Based on the data of the questionnaire, the author has build LISREL model.
sentences.chinese: 利用問卷獲得的數據，建立LISREL方程。

sentences.english: Moreover, we analyze 958 effective questionnaires for the direct employees.
sentences.chinese: 接著進一步取得有效員工問卷958份進行分析。

sentences.english: The results from this questionnaire would compare with the cloze test.
sentences.chinese: 此問卷的結果會與克漏字測驗結果比較。

sentences.english: They asked subjects to fill out a questionnaire after dinner on Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 他們讓受試者在用過感恩節晚餐之後填寫一份問卷。

sentences.english: This study collected materials through questionnaire survey and in-dept interview.
sentences.chinese: 本研究利用問卷調查和個案訪談的資料。

definition: to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
